sentences.sContent: Japan should felicitate the opening of branches of Japanese vessel building industries along the Indian docks and port.
sentences.sContent_eng: Japan should felicitate the opening of branches of Japanese vessel building industries along the Indian docks and port.
sentences.sCn: 日本该庆祝印度港口里日本造船分厂的开设。

remMethod.val: felic(幸福的) + itate → 使…幸福 → 祝贺
